text: Jodie Foster (born Alicia Christian Foster; November 19, 1962) is an American actress, director and producer. She has starred in many movies like Bugsy Malone, Taxi Driver, The Silence of the Lambs and Panic Room. She has won many awards including two Oscars. Foster began directing movies in 1991. These include Little Man Tate; Home for the Holidays and The Beaver. Foster is openly lesbianJodie Foster comes out and is married to photographer Alexandra Hedison. Hedison is the daughter of actor David Hedison. ==Movie work== *1976: Taxi Driver as Iris Steensma *1976: Bugsy Malone as Tallulah *1988: The Accused as Sarah Tobias *1991: The Silence of the Lambs as Clarice Starling *1994: Nell as Nell Kellty *1997: Contact as Dr. Eleanor "Ellie" Arroway *2002: Panic Room as Meg Altman *2021: The Mauritanian as Nancy Hollander ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:American Academy Award winning actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:Lesbians Category:LGBT actors Category:LGBT directors Category:LGBT people from Los Angeles Category:LGBT producers Category:Movie directors from Los Angeles Category:Movie producers from Los Angeles Category:Screen Actors Guild Award winners
title: Jodie Foster
